toxin_classes.name: Gyromitrin Toxicology Research Team
toxin_classes.title: Hydrazine Metabolite & MMH Researchers
toxin_classes.contact: Monomethylhydrazine (MMH) from gyromitrin: cytotoxic, blocks cytochrome P450, inhibits GABA synthesis

toxin_classes.name: Morel Poisoning Event Research Team
toxin_classes.title: Raw Morel Toxicity Researchers
toxin_classes.contact: March-April 2023: 50 sick, 2 deaths from raw/undercooked Morchella sextelata

special_considerations.name: Cooking Safety Research Team
special_considerations.title: Thermal Detoxification Researchers
special_considerations.contact: Boiling 10 min destroys 99.5% hydrazines; crude morels induce gastrointestinal syndrome (2020)

confusion_species_notes.name: Gyromitra Identification Safety Team
confusion_species_notes.title: False vs True Morel Morphology Researchers
confusion_species_notes.contact: Gyromitra: brain-like folds, cap detached from stalk, filled; Morchella: honeycomb pits, cap fused to stalk, hollow

confusion_species_notes.name: Poland Mushroom Fatality Research Team
confusion_species_notes.title: Gyromitra Mortality Statistics Researchers
confusion_species_notes.contact: G. esculenta responsible for 23% of mushroom fatalities/year in Poland

habitat_types.name: Post-Fire Morel Ecology Research Team
habitat_types.title: Wildfire Fruiting Pattern Researchers
habitat_types.contact: 1693 morels/hectare post-fire Sierra Nevada; spatial autocorrelation <7m (2016)

habitat_types.name: Burn Morel Dormancy Research Team
habitat_types.title: Mycelial Dormancy & Fire Trigger Researchers
habitat_types.contact: Mycelium dormant up to 50 years, only fruits after fire (2024)

habitat_types.name: Israeli Burnt Forest Research Team
habitat_types.title: Black Morel Micro-site Researchers
habitat_types.contact: Cleared stumps, compacted soil, chopped wood create preferred micro-sites

commercial_value.name: China Artificial Cultivation Research Team
commercial_value.title: Large-Scale Field Cultivation Researchers
commercial_value.contact: Sichuan 2012: commercial development, up to 15,000 kg/hectare (2023)

commercial_value.name: Exogenous Nutrient Bag Research Team
commercial_value.title: Wheat Substrate & Non-Grain Development Researchers
commercial_value.contact: M. sextelata: wheat grains primary substrate, costly, non-grain alternatives needed (2023)

commercial_value.name: Cultivable Species Research Team
commercial_value.title: Morchella Species Cultivation Success Researchers
commercial_value.contact: M. importuna, M. sextelata, M. eximia cultivable; Esculenta clade still impossible (2023)

culinary_traditions.name: French Haute Cuisine Documentation Team
culinary_traditions.title: Gourmet Mushroom Cultural Researchers
culinary_traditions.contact: Growing Gold of Mountains: high nutritive value, French haute cuisine tradition

nutritional_highlights.name: Vitamin D & Protein Research Team
nutritional_highlights.title: Nutritional Composition Researchers
nutritional_highlights.contact: High protein, vitamin D, iron, zinc content

associated_trees.name: Ash & Elm Association Research Team
associated_trees.title: Tree Symbiosis Ecology Researchers
associated_trees.contact: Productivity in healthy, burned, insect-damaged forests of northeastern Oregon

indicator_species_for.name: Soil Disturbance Indicator Research Team
indicator_species_for.title: Humus & Fire Site Ecology Researchers
indicator_species_for.contact: Heterogeneous factors control post-fire productivity at small spatial scales
